column9:
Thank you for your email.

I am currently on annual leave and will be returning to the office on Monday 4th July 2011.
Should your email require urgent attention – please phone Honor Masterman on 08 8267 3001 – and she will redirect your call to the person who will be able to best assist with your enquiry.
Alternatively I will respond to your email upon my return to the office.

Thank you for your patience.

With Kind Regards

Bianca Sowik
Business Development & Marketing Manager
Country Club Hotels & Resorts
